comments:
Abolished 1.4.1922 and added to the parish of Stoke-on-Trent. 
    See also Table 2, notes (a) and (e).

Created 1894 from out of the parish of Wolstanton. Abolished 1.4.1922 
    and added to the parish of Stoke-on-Trent. See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 1894 from out of the parish of Wolstanton. See also Table 
    2, note (e).

Created 1894 from out of the parish of Wolstanton. Abolished 1.4.1922 
    and added to the parish of Stoke-on-Trent. See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Wolstanton in Kidsgrove 
    Urban District. See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Burslem. Abolished 
    1.4.1922 and divided between the parishes of Stoke-on-Trent and Norton in the 
    Moors. See also Table 2, notes (b), (c), (d) and (e).

Created 1894 from out of the parish of Wolstanton. See also Table 
    2, notes (e) and (e).

Created 1894 from out of the parish of Wolstanton. See also Table 
    2, note (e).

That part which until 1.4.1922 formed the parishes of Burslem, 
    Chell and Goldenhill and parts of the parishes of Milton and Newchapel. 
    See also Table 2, note (e).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Wolstanton in Tunstall 
    Urban District. Abolished 1.4.1922 and added to the parish of Stoke-on-Trent.
